Invalid Data is being added to Market Tracker Database without error,NP-48,10170,Bug,To Do,NP,New Project,software,Sumit Gupta,620b3324eb2978006891009e,,Medium,,,,Sumit Gupta,620b3324eb2978006891009e,Sumit Gupta,620b3324eb2978006891009e,18/Feb/22 2:11 PM,18/Feb/22 4:36 PM,18/Feb/22 4:34 PM,,,0,"+*Steps To Reproduce:-*+
1.Open upskill platform and login.
2. Click on Share icon and navigate to marketing tab
3.Select either add or edit icon
4. Now enter invalid test data in either Campaign Name and Tracking Code.(For list of Invalid Data refer to attached test-cases)
5.The Faulty data will be added to database.
+*Because of this issue some filter features are also affected, keys of which are mentioned:-*+

Invalid Data is being added in database of Gift Voucher Theme module,NP-47,10169,Bug,To Do,NP,New Project,software,Sumit Gupta,620b3324eb2978006891009e,,Medium,,,,Sumit Gupta,620b3324eb2978006891009e,Sumit Gupta,620b3324eb2978006891009e,18/Feb/22 12:55 PM,18/Feb/22 4:36 PM,18/Feb/22 3:49 PM,,,0,"+*Steps To Reproduce:-*+
1.Open upskill platform and login.
2.Click on Cart icon and navigate to Gift Voucher Theme tab
3.Select either add or edit icon
4.Now enter invalid test data in either Campaign Name and Tracking Code.(For list of Invalid Data refer to attached test-cases)
5.The Faulty data will be added to database.
